items.title: Russia becomes first state to recognise Afghanistan's Taliban government
items.description: The foreign minister in Kabul called Moscow's decision "courageous".

items.title: American teen pilot detained on small island in Antarctica
items.description: Ethan Guo, 19, had flown his plane across the six other continents before he was arrested, according to his social media.

items.title: Boxer Julio Cesar Chavez Jr arrested by US immigration
items.description: The boxer, who fought against Jake Paul on Saturday, is accused of ties to the Sinaloa drug cartel.

items.title: Congress passes Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' cutting taxes and spending
items.description: The president wins over sparring factions within his own party to get the bill passed after months of wrangling.

items.title: Gaza aid contractor tells BBC he saw colleagues fire on hungry Palestinians
items.description: The Israel- and US-backed Gaza Humanitarian Foundation has strongly denied the allegation.
